comments:
Build ID: I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
With 3.3M6 and Mylar 2.0.0 I get the following event loop exception when selecting a repository to add.  I have the option to add a web based or bugzilla repository and I get the error regardless of which one I select.  I can't get past the first page of the wizard.

I can't tell if I have M1 or M2.  I have whatever the update site is currently listing as the latest version.

More information:

Mik, could this be an inconsistent configuration? Like 3.3M6 with an old mylar install perhaps? We resolved these issues with the .align getting the wrong parameter ages ago.
Could be.  I suggest trying with the latest dev build.

With the latest milestone build of mylar I no longer see the problem.

So the bad configuration is 3.3m[56] and Mylar 2.0.0. 

I wouldn't worry about this.  I should have been using the milestone build to begin with.
